feed.title: Hubzilla Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Hubzilla: 10.0.2
entry.content: Hotfix release to fix loop caused by Daemon/Expire and other minor issues

entry.title: New release for Hubzilla: 10.0.3
entry.content:
Hubzilla 10.0.3 - Fix regression in Daemon/Channel_purge which could cause a possible infinite loop - Fix regression in Daemon/Expire which could cause a infinite loop

Hubzilla 10.0.2 - Hotfix comment out Daemon/Expire - Fix zid parameter allowed to override an existing remote login - Slightly improved imagesLoaded()

entry.title: New release for Hubzilla: Hubzilla 10.0.5
entry.content: • Fix another instance of drop_item() not having permission to drop items

entry.title: New release for Hubzilla: Hubzilla 10.0.6
entry.content:
• Fix entries where primary location data is not complete not dismissed early
  • Fix query to cleanup outdated doc entries called multiple times
  • Fix query to cleanup outdated doc entries
